articles.title: Are formal dining rooms a thing of the past? Depends who you ask.
articles.description:
“What was once about presentation is now about connection,” one designer said. “The dining room isn’t dead – it’s just evolved.”                      

The post Are formal dining rooms a thing of the past? Depends who you ask. appeared first on Boston.com.
